statements: DELETE FROM EmployeePerformanceMetrics WHERE conflict_of_interest = TRUE;
DELETE FROM EmployeePerformanceMetrics WHERE conflict_of_interest = TRUE AND performance_rating > 4.5;
DELETE FROM ConflictsOfInterest WHERE conflict_type = 'Financial' AND description LIKE '%conflict%'
DELETE FROM Employee_Performance_Metrics WHERE employee_id = 100 AND performance_rating < 3
DELETE FROM Conflict_Resolution_Log WHERE employee_id = 200 AND resolution_status = 'Pending'
DELETE FROM Conflict WHERE conflict_description = 'Harassment' AND date_reported = '2021-10-15';
DELETE FROM ConflictResolution WHERE conflict_id = 'cd58e73e-c1cb-4f39-9fe8-8eea533cda6b' AND resolved_by = '1c64d6c6-54a9-4a55-ba2c-a5821f648fdf';
